TopicTitle: This is too hard for anyone?

Articles.Content:
[Request] Please help me to build a multipurpose craft. (Air+Land)

A bit disappointed when see no body actually reply on the thread. Is it too hard? Too boring? or just too lack of helping hand?

Thanks all. I did it mine way.

Edited September 10, 2013 by Sirine

The answer is simple. Build a long range plane. Step 2: add rover wheels that don't touch the ground. Retract landing gear and now you have a rover. Done. Go to mission reports and look for a good Lathe mission. Most of them have something like this.
I prefer to use Touhou's wheels for this kind of thing since they can land at high speed but they are also steerable and motorized.
Well, that requires a Mod. Im not a multiwheels fan and I have yet to break the rover wheels on landing if I do m suggestion correctly.

this guy built one: http://www.mindspring.com/~sportrocketry/ksp/birddog.html

looks like Captain Sierra's suggestion.
